SEARCH
Package menu

Class MenuDirectory

java.lang.Object
menu.MenuDirectory
public class MenuDirectory extends Object
Handles operations on Menu records and stores existing Menu records.

      public double getPriceByNameAndBranch(String name, String branch)
      Get the price of a MenuItem given its name and Branch.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the MenuItem.
      branch - the Branch of the MenuItem.
      Returns:

    • rmvMenuByBranch

      public void rmvMenuByBranch(ArrayList<MenuItem> menuItems, String branchName)
      Removes existing MenuItems in a specific Branch after verifying it exists in that Branch.
      Parameters:
      menuItems - The ArrayList of MenuItems to refer to, and remove MenuItems one by one.
      branchName - The name of the Branch to retrieve the Menu from.
